item.description:
Tibetan Singing Bowls with EMILE DE LEON

Learn all the secrets of the Tibetan Singing Bowls from the worlds foremost Tibetan bowl exponent of the past 15 years. See and play top rare antique bowls and bowl sets and experience them in person in their full glory and sound. Tibetan Singing Bowls are known for their healing and meditative powers as well as their ability to bring happiness into your life. This class will cover all the basics including playing techniques, bowl understanding & analysis, meditation, and musical expression as well as healing aspects. A healing bowl meditation will also be included in the class.

These classes only are held once in a blue moon by musician and recording artist Emile de Leon and space is limited so be sure to call to pre-register ASAP. Call (860) 347-3220, (860) 347-3220, or email knightpeople@msn.com. This class is held in our beautiful meditation room. Please visit www.templesounds.net for more info.

Knight People
Middletown, CT
Time: 12 noon to 2 p.m.
Cost: $45 - prepayment will hold your spot.
item.name: Tibetan Singing Bowls: See, Hear & Play
